REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E F f0319 reute d f BC-shadowfax 03-11 0050

TEXT.TITLE: SHADOWFAX <SHFXF> SETS NORMAL COURSE ISSUER BID
TEXT.BODY: Shadowfax Resources Ltd said it set a normal course issuer bid to acquire for cancellation up to five pct of its three mln outstanding common shares on the open market on the Alberta Stock Exchange, subject to regulatory approvals. Reuter
